ADDRESS.NAMESERVER_IP_PRIVATE_NETWORK: Nameserver {ns} has an IP address ({address}) with prefix {prefix} referenced in {reference} as a '{name}'.
ADDRESS.NAMESERVER_IP_PTR_MISMATCH: Nameserver {ns} has an IP address ({address}) with mismatched PTR result ({names}).
ADDRESS.NAMESERVER_IP_WITHOUT_REVERSE: Nameserver {ns} has an IP address ({address}) without PTR configured.
ADDRESS.NAMESERVER_IPV6_ADDRESSES_NOT_BOGON: None of the {nb} nameserver(s) with IPv6 addresses is part of a bogon prefix.
ADDRESS.NAMESERVER_IPV6_ADDRESS_BOGON: Nameserver {ns} IPv6 address {address} is part of a bogon prefix.

BASIC.HAS_GLUE: Nameserver for zone {parent} listed these nameservers as glue: {ns}
BASIC.HAS_NAMESERVERS: Nameserver {source} listed these servers as glue: {ns}
BASIC.NO_DOMAIN: Nameserver for zone {parent} responded with NXDOMAIN to query for glue.
BASIC.NO_GLUE: Nameservers for "{parent}" provided no NS records for tested zone. RCODE given was {rcode}.
BASIC.NO_PARENT_RESPONSE: No response from nameserver for zone {parent} when trying to fetch glue.
BASIC.NS_FAILED: Nameserver {source} did not return NS records. RCODE was {rcode}.
BASIC.NS_NO_RESPONSE: Nameserver {source} did not respond to NS query.

CONNECTIVITY.ADDRESS_TYPE_NOT_IMPLEMENTED: Service provided by - {service} - does not work with IPv{type} addresses
CONNECTIVITY.NAMESERVERS_IPV4_WITH_UNIQ_AS: All nameservers IPv4 addresses are in the same AS ({asn}).
CONNECTIVITY.NAMESERVERS_IPV6_WITH_UNIQ_AS: All nameservers IPv6 addresses are in the same AS ({asn}).
CONNECTIVITY.NAMESERVERS_WITH_UNIQ_AS: All nameservers are in the same AS ({asn}).
CONNECTIVITY.NAMESERVER_HAS_TCP_53: Nameserver {ns}/{address} accessible over TCP on port 53.
CONNECTIVITY.NAMESERVER_HAS_UDP_53: Nameserver {ns}/{address} accessible over UDP on port 53.
CONNECTIVITY.NAMESERVER_NO_TCP_53: Nameserver {ns}/{address} not accessible over TCP on port 53.
CONNECTIVITY.NAMESERVER_NO_UDP_53: Nameserver {ns}/{address} not accessible over UDP on port 53.

CONSISTENCY.ONE_SOA_RNAME: A single SOA rname value was seen ({rname})
CONSISTENCY.ONE_SOA_SERIAL: A single SOA serial number was seen ({serial}).
CONSISTENCY.ONE_SOA_TIME_PARAMETER_SET: A single SOA time parameter set was seen (REFRESH={refresh},RETRY={retry},EXPIRE={expire},MINIMUM={minimum}).
CONSISTENCY.SOA_RNAME: Saw SOA rname {rname} on following nameserver set : {servers}.
CONSISTENCY.SOA_SERIAL: Saw SOA serial number {serial} on following nameserver set : {servers}.
CONSISTENCY.SOA_TIME_PARAMETER_SET: Saw SOA time parameter set (REFRESH={refresh},RETRY={retry},EXPIRE={expire},MINIMUM={minimum}) on following nameserver set : {servers}.

DELEGATION.EXTRA_NAME_CHILD: Child has nameserver(s) not listed at parent ({extra}).
DELEGATION.EXTRA_NAME_PARENT: Parent has nameserver(s) not listed at the child ({extra}).
DELEGATION.IS_NOT_AUTHORITATIVE: Nameserver {ns} response is not authoritative on {proto} port 53.
DELEGATION.NAMES_MATCH: All of the nameserver names are listed both at parent and child.
DELEGATION.NOT_ENOUGH_NS: Child does not list enough nameservers ({count}).
DELEGATION.NOT_ENOUGH_NS_GLUE: Parent does not list enough nameservers ({count}).
DELEGATION.REFERRAL_SIZE_LARGE: The smallest possible legal referral packet is larger than 512 octets (it is {size}).
DELEGATION.REFERRAL_SIZE_OK: The smallest possible legal referral packet is smaller than 513 octets (it is {size}).
DELEGATION.SOA_NOT_EXISTS: A SOA query NOERROR response from {ns} was received empty.
DELEGATION.TOTAL_NAME_MISMATCH: None of the nameservers listed at the parent are listed at the child.

HOSTNAME.DASH_END: {name} has a label that ends with a dash character.
HOSTNAME.NON_ALPHANUMERIC_START: {name} does not start with an alphanumeric character.
HOSTNAME.NON_NUMERIC_TOP: {name} does not have an all-numeric top-level label.
HOSTNAME.NO_DASH_END: {name} has no labels ending with dash characters.

NAMESERVER.ANSWER_BAD_RCODE: Nameserver {ns}/{address} answered AAAA query with an unexpected rcode ({rcode}).
NAMESERVER.AXFR_AVAILABLE: Nameserver {ns}/{address} allow zone transfer using AXFR.
NAMESERVER.EDNS0_BAD_ANSWER: Nameserver {ns}/{address} does not support EDNS0 (OPT not set in reply)
NAMESERVER.EDNS0_BAD_QUERY: Nameserver {ns}/{address} does not support EDNS0 (replies with FORMERR)
NAMESERVER.IS_A_RECURSOR: Nameserver {ns} answered with a RCODE NXDOMAIN to SOA query on {dname}.
NAMESERVER.SAME_SOURCE_IP: Nameserver {ns}/{address} replies on a SOA query with a different source address ({source}).

SYNTAX.DISCOURAGED_DOUBLE_DASH: Domain name ({name}) has a label ({label}) with a double hyphen ('--') in position 3 and 4  (with a prefix which is not 'xn--').
SYNTAX.INITIAL_HYPHEN: Domain name ({name}) has a label ({label}) starting with an hyphen ('-').
SYNTAX.MNAME_DISCOURAGED_DOUBLE_DASH: SOA MNAME ({name}) has a label ({label}) with a double hyphen ('--') in position 3 and 4  (with a prefix which is not 'xn--').
SYNTAX.MNAME_LABEL_TOO_LONG: SOA MNAME ({name}) has a label ({label}) too long ({length}/{max}).
SYNTAX.MNAME_NUMERIC_TLD: SOA MNAME ({name}) within a 'numeric only' TLD ({tld}).
SYNTAX.MX_DISCOURAGED_DOUBLE_DASH: Domain name MX ({name}) has a label ({label}) with a double hyphen ('--') in position 3 and 4  (with a prefix which is not 'xn--').
SYNTAX.MX_LABEL_TOO_LONG: Domain name MX ({name}) has a label ({label}) too long ({length}/{max}).
SYNTAX.MX_NAME_TOO_LONG: Domain name MX  is too long ({length}/{max}).
SYNTAX.MX_NUMERIC_TLD: Domain name MX ({name}) within a 'numeric only' TLD ({tld}).
SYNTAX.NAMESERVER_DISCOURAGED_DOUBLE_DASH: Nameserver ({name}) has a label ({label}) with a double hyphen ('--') in position 3 and 4  (with a prefix which is not 'xn--').
SYNTAX.NAMESERVER_LABEL_TOO_LONG: Nameserver ({name}) has a label ({label}) too long ({length}/{max}).
SYNTAX.NON_ALLOWED_CHARS: Found illegal characters in the domain name ({name})
SYNTAX.ONLY_ALLOWED_CHARS: No illegal chatacters in the domain name ({name}).
SYNTAX.RNAME_MISUSED_AT_SIGN: There must be no misused '@' character in the SOA RNAME field ({rname}).
SYNTAX.RNAME_RFC822_INVALID: There must be no illegal characters in the SOA RNAME field ({rname}).
SYNTAX.TERMINAL_HYPHEN: Domain name ({name}) has a label ({label}) ending with an hyphen ('-').

SYSTEM.CANNOT_CONTINUE: Not enough data about {zone} was found to be able to run tests.
SYSTEM.LOOKUP_ERROR: DNS query to {ns} for {name}/{type}/{class} failed with error: {message}
SYSTEM.UNKNOWN_METHOD: Request to run unknown method {method} in module {moduke}.
SYSTEM.UNKNOWN_MODULE: Request to run {method} in unknown module {module}. Known modules: {known}.

ZONE.EXPIRE_LOWER_THAN_REFRESH: SOA 'expire' value ({expire}) is lower than the SOA 'refresh' value ({refresh}).
ZONE.EXPIRE_MINIMUM_VALUE_LOWER: SOA 'expire' value ({expire}) is less than the recommended one ({required_expire}).
ZONE.MASTER_IS_AN_ALIAS: SOA 'mname' value ({mname}) refers to a NS which is an alias (CNAME).
ZONE.MNAME_NOT_AUTHORITATIVE: SOA 'mname' nameserver {ns}/{address} is not authoritative for '{zone}' zone.
ZONE.MNAME_NOT_IN_GLUE: SOA 'mname' nameserver is not listed in "parent" NS records for tested zone.
ZONE.MX_RECORD_IS_CNAME: MX record for the domain is pointing to a CNAME.
ZONE.NO_MX_RECORD: No target (MX, A or AAA record) to deliver e-mail for the domain name.
ZONE.REFRESH_LOWER_THAN_RETRY: SOA 'refresh' value ({refresh}) is lower than the SOA 'retry' value ({retry}).
ZONE.REFRESH_MINIMUM_VALUE_LOWER: SOA 'refresh' value ({refresh}) is less than the recommended one ({required_refresh}).
ZONE.RETRY_MINIMUM_VALUE_LOWER: SOA 'retry' value ({retry}) is less than the recommended one ({required_retry}).
ZONE.SOA_DEFAULT_TTL_MAXIMUM_VALUE_HIGHER: SOA 'minimum' value ({minimum}) is higher than the recommended one ({highest_minimum}).
ZONE.SOA_DEFAULT_TTL_MAXIMUM_VALUE_LOWER: SOA 'minimum' value ({minimum}) is less than the recommended one ({lowest_minimum}).
